metadata.feature_description: Analytics dashboard specifically for the Answers module showing Q&A metrics

steps.actual: Login successful, redirected to home page with PersonaBar visible

steps.expected: Dashboard submenu appears with Site Analytics and Community Analytics options
steps.actual: Dashboard submenu appeared with Site Analytics and Community Analytics options

steps.expected: Community Analytics dashboard loads showing various analytics tabs including Answers
steps.actual: Community Analytics dashboard failed to load. JavaScript error: TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function. The dashboard panel remains empty/blank.

issues: Critical JavaScript error prevents Community Analytics dashboard from loading: TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function in social-dashboard-combined-instance.js:1025
Cannot view answer-specific metrics because the entire Community Analytics module fails to initialize

steps.action: Attempted to access Community Analytics dashboard
steps.expected: Dashboard loads with Answers tab showing question resolution rates
steps.actual: Dashboard failed to load due to JavaScript error: TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function

issues: Cannot track question resolution rates because the Community Analytics dashboard fails to load due to JavaScript error

steps.action: Attempted to access Community Analytics dashboard
steps.expected: Dashboard loads with Answers tab showing answer quality metrics
steps.actual: Dashboard failed to load due to JavaScript error: TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function

issues: Cannot monitor answer quality metrics because the Community Analytics dashboard fails to load due to JavaScript error

steps.action: Attempted to access Community Analytics dashboard to test time period filtering
steps.expected: Dashboard loads with time period filter controls
steps.actual: Dashboard failed to load due to JavaScript error: TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function

issues: Cannot test time period filtering because the Community Analytics dashboard fails to load due to JavaScript error

steps.action: Attempted to access Community Analytics dashboard to verify Answers module data isolation
steps.expected: Dashboard loads with Answers-specific data separate from other modules
steps.actual: Dashboard failed to load due to JavaScript error: TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function

issues: Cannot verify module-specific data isolation because the Community Analytics dashboard fails to load due to JavaScript error

steps.action: Attempted to access Community Analytics dashboard to compare answer metrics over time
steps.expected: Dashboard loads with comparative analytics functionality
steps.actual: Dashboard failed to load due to JavaScript error: TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function

issues: Cannot compare answer metrics over time because the Community Analytics dashboard fails to load due to JavaScript error

observations: The Community Analytics module exists in the PersonaBar Dashboard menu and can be clicked
A critical JavaScript error prevents the dashboard from initializing: TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function
The error occurs in social-dashboard-combined-instance.js at line 1025 during the dashboardClass.init function
The utility.serializeCustomDate function appears to be missing or not properly defined in the utility module
This is a systemic issue affecting the entire Community Analytics module, not just the Answers tab
Code review shows the backend API endpoints exist (GetModuleDashboardInfo, GetModuleContextData, etc.) but the frontend JavaScript is broken
